languages.text: "...Видите? Яд уже начал распространяться по его телу. Кровь в глазах — первый признак поцелуя смерти".

traits.locale_text: "...Видите? Яд уже начал распространяться по его телу. Кровь в глазах — первый признак поцелуя смерти".

languages.text: "Do you see? The poison has begun to spread through his body. Blood in the eyes is the first sign of death's kiss."
languages.original_text: "...Видите? Яд уже начал распространяться по его телу. Кровь в глазах — первый признак поцелуя смерти".

traits.locale_text: "...See? The poison has started spreading through his body. Blood in the eyes is the first sign of the kiss of death."
"...See? The poison has started spreading through his body. Blood in the eyes is the first sign of the kiss of death."
"...See? The poison has begun to spread through his body. Blood in the eyes is the first sign of death's kiss."
"...See? The poison has begun to spread through his body. Blood in the eyes is the first sign of death's kiss."
"Do you see? The poison has begun to spread through his body. Blood in the eyes is the first sign of death's kiss."
"Do you see? The poison has begun to spread through his body. Blood in the eyes is the first sign of death's kiss."

languages.text: « Et voilà... Le poison a commencé à se répandre dans son sang. Les yeux injectés de sang trahissent l'imminence du baiser de la mort. »
languages.original_text: "Do you see? The poison has begun to spread through his body. Blood in the eyes is the first sign of death's kiss."

traits.locale_text: « Et voilà... Le poison a commencé à se répandre dans son sang. Les yeux injectés de sang trahissent l'imminence du baiser de la mort. »

languages.text: «¿Lo ve? El veneno ha empezado a propagarse por su cuerpo. La sangre en los ojos es la primera señal del beso de la muerte».
languages.original_text: "Do you see? The poison has begun to spread through his body. Blood in the eyes is the first sign of death's kiss."

traits.locale_text: «¿Lo ve? El veneno ha empezado a propagarse por su cuerpo. La sangre en los ojos es la primera señal del beso de la muerte».

languages.text: 「分かるか？毒が体中に回り始めている。目に血がにじむのは、死の接吻が始まる最初の兆候だ」
languages.original_text: "Do you see? The poison has begun to spread through his body. Blood in the eyes is the first sign of death's kiss."

traits.locale_text: 「分かるか？毒が体中に回り始めている。目に血がにじむのは、死の接吻が始まる最初の兆候だ」

languages.text: “看到了吗？毒液已经开始在他体内扩散了，充血的眼球就是死亡之吻的第一个标志。”
languages.original_text: "Do you see? The poison has begun to spread through his body. Blood in the eyes is the first sign of death's kiss."

traits.locale_text: “看到了吗？毒液已经开始在他体内扩散了，充血的眼球就是死亡之吻的第一个标志。”

languages.text: "Seht Ihr? Das Blut hat begonnen, sich in seinem Körper auszubreiten. Blut in den Augen ist das erste Anzeichen des Kusses des Todes."
languages.original_text: "Do you see? The poison has begun to spread through his body. Blood in the eyes is the first sign of death's kiss."

traits.locale_text: "Seht Ihr? Das Blut hat begonnen, sich in seinem Körper auszubreiten. Blut in den Augen ist das erste Anzeichen des Kusses des Todes."

languages.text: "Gördün mü? Zehir bedeninde yayılmaya başladı. Gözlere oturan kan, ölümün öpücüğünün ilk işaretidir."
languages.original_text: "Do you see? The poison has begun to spread through his body. Blood in the eyes is the first sign of death's kiss."
